= Installation =

1. Unpak patches for Joomla in root catalog of Joomla site.

2. !!! Unpack Joomla Captcha *3.0.0* Template Patch for Joomla 1.5
(Patch-JoomlaCaptha300 -for-Joomla157.zip) *in root catalog* of Joomla site.

Unpak patches (*only 1 n 2 releases*) for Temlpate *in folder "html" for used templates*  

3. Install plugin.

4. Save plugin parameters.

5. Enjoy.

= Upgrade = 

Unpack zip file in your Joomla! site root

Note.

From Joomla Captcha 3.0.0 Core and Template patches all in one file

= Patches = 

All patches unpack in your Joomla! site root
